dcterms:description: The Hindi training dataset included a total of 4594 training samples which were divided into two tasks with an average of 26 words per sentence. Task 1 contained binary labels similar to Marathi i.e. HOF and NOT. Task 2 contained multiclass labels with 4 classes namely NONE, OFFN, HATE, PRFN.
dcterms:title: HASOC 2021 Hindi hate speech dataset

dcterms:description: The Marathi dataset consisted of 1874 training samples with an average of 13 words per sentence. It contained a total of 625 testing samples and has binary labels indicating hate and offensive content.
dcterms:title: HASOC 2021 Marathi hate speech dataset
